FILE (GLOB_RECURSE CXX_SRC_FILES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp")

ADD_LIBRARY (imnodes STATIC ${CXX_SRC_FILES})

TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS (imnodes PUBLIC "_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS")

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (imnodes PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (imnodes PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/imnodes")

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (imnodes PUBLIC imgui)
